title: Drawing, "The Four Evangelists, Study after Giambologna", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at center: Gian Bologna Bologna; at lower center: Gian Bologna Bologna; at lower left: 24
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Upper drawing of Four Evangelist, in pairs; at left St.Luke and St.John; at right St. Matthew and St.Mark, all with attributes. Lower drawing of two pairs of Saints, or Doctors of Church, all with books; at left, Saint with flat hat--St. Anthony Abbot(?), and saint who is Pope; at right, two Bishop Saints.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Four Evangelists, Study after Giambologna", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over black chalk on white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3567-2.
